question.title: Will Elon Musk show up at the Bitcoin Nashville 2024?
question.body:
This market will resolve YES, if Elon Musk becomes a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024, one of the largest Bitcoin conferences, taking place on July 25-27, 2024.

[image]

Q.title: Will Elon Musk make a public statement about Bitcoin at any event in 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve YES if Elon Musk publicly discusses Bitcoin at any event in 2024, regardless of whether he attends the Bitcoin Nashville 2024 or not.

- For Q: Resolves YES if Elon Musk becomes a guest on the official stage of the Bitcoin Nashville 2024.
